Effects.Full:
Blessing of Ice: When the number of stacks of this buff reaches 4, Hero's Principles is enhanced. The skill will ignore 15% of the damage reduction from Cover, deals Ice damage, and increases damage dealt towards enemies on friendly Ice type tiles to 130%. This buff can be stacked up to 4 times, is only effective once, and cannot be dispelled

Frost: Applies Solidification on enemies on this tile after the end of their action for 2 turns, and inflicts Ice weakness on the enemy standing on it after the end of their action. This tile is considered as a Ice type tile

Solidification: Decreases Movement Speed by 1 tile; at the end of the action, if the holder has 2 layers of Solidification, it is converted into Chill, which lasts for 1 turn. Solidification can be stacked up to 2 layers. This is considered as a Ice type debuff

Chill: Cannot move or be displaced. This is considered as a Ice type debuff

Blizzard's Prayer: Inflicts Solidification on the target before using an active attack, and increases damage dealt by 10%. This only takes effect once, is considered as a buff, and cannot be dispelled

Blizzard's Domain: If an ally dealt single target damage to an enemy within attack range, Dushevnaya activates Action Support against the enemy afterwards, dealing Physical damage equivalent to 80% ATK and 2 Stability Damage to it. This effect can be triggered up to 2 times per turn, and cannot be dispelled

Action Support: This is considered as a Support attack. Attacks once. Cannot be triggered by Support attacks

Movement Increase II: Increases movement speed by 2 tiles. This is considered as a buff

Insight: Increases effective range of Ultimate skill by 1 tile. This is considered as a buff

Vulnerability II: Increases damage received by 20%

Basic.Description: Selects an enemy target within a 8 tile radius and deals Physical damage equivalent to 80% ATK to it

Skill.Description: Selects an enemy target within a 8 tile radius and deals Physical damage equivalent to 110% ATK to it. If this skill kills an enemy with Ice type debuff, Dushevnaya gains 1 stack of Blessing of Ice
Skill.Vertebrae 1: Increases the number of stacks of Blessing of Ice gained by 1. When the number of stacks reaches 4, increases damage dealt towards enemies to 140%. If the target is on friendly Ice type tiles, increases damage dealt to 160%

Skill2.Description:
Selects a tile within a 6 tile radius, deals AoE Ice damage equivalent to 50% ATK to all enemies within a 2 tile radius of the specified tile, and creates Frost tiles that lasts for 2 turns

Enhances the skill on the next use, which increases damage dealt from 50% to 120% ATK, and inflicts Solidification on the target for 1 turn. If the skill is enhanced, it cannot be enhanced again

If Dushevnaya's Contamination Gauge is full, this skill can be immediately used again
Skill2.Vertebrae 3: Increases effect range by 1 tile. Increases AoE Ice damage dealt to 70% ATK, and increases AoE Ice damage dealt while the skill is enhanced to 90% ATK
Skill2.Fixed Key 4: Winter God's Approval: If this skill causes the enemy to enter into Stability Break, inflicts DEF Decrease II for 2 turns

Ultimate.Description: Applies 1 stack of Blizzard's Prayer to all allies within a 7 tiles radius. Increases Contamination Gauge by 2 points, and gains Blizzard's Domain for 2 turns. While Dushevnaya has Blizzard's Domain, if Contamination Gauge is at 0 points at the end of the action, increases Contamination Gauge by 2 points
Ultimate.Vertebrae 3: Increases effect range by 2 tiles. Applies a random powerful buff and Movement Increase II for all allies within range for 2 turns. Blizzard's Prayer increases damage dealt by 20% instead
Ultimate.Vertebrae 5: Dispels 1 buff from 4 random enemies within range. Increases the number of stacks of Blizzard's Prayer applies by 1. While Dushevnaya has Blizzard's Domain, attacks ignore 30% of the target's DEF, and increases the number of Action Support used by 1 time

Passive.Description:
Increases damage dealt for all allies by 10%, and additionally increases Ice damage dealt by 10%. At the end of the action, increases Contamination Gauge by 2 points

If Dushevnaya's HP is above 80%, decreases damage dealt to Stability Gauge by 1 point, and gains Insight. While Dushevnaya has Insight, increases attack range of all skills (excluding Ultimate) and Support attacks by 1 tile
Passive.Vertebrae 4: Attacks ignore 15% of the damage reduction from Cover. At the start of the action, creates Frost tiles within a 1 tile radius for 2 turns. If Dushevnaya is on friendly Ice type tiles, increases damage dealt to Stability Gauge by 1 point
Passive.Vertebrae 6: Increases damage dealt for all allies by 20%, and additionally increases Ice damage dealt by 40% instead. Dispels 1 Defense type buff after using an active attack. If Dushevnaya is on friendly Ice type tiles, inflicts Vulnerability II on the target for 2 turns

1.Effect: Increases effect range by 2 tiles. Applies a random powerful buff and Movement Increase II for all allies within range for 2 turns. Blizzard's Prayer increases damage dealt by 20% instead

2.Effect: Attacks ignore 15% of the damage reduction from Cover. At the start of the action, creates Frost tiles within a 1 tile radius for 2 turns. If Dushevnaya is on friendly Ice type tiles, increases damage dealt to Stability Gauge by 1 point

3.Effect: Increases effect range by 1 tile. Increases AoE Ice damage dealt to 70% ATK, and increases AoE Ice damage dealt while the skill is enhanced to 90% ATK

4.Effect: Increases the number of stacks of Blessing of Ice gained by 1. When the number of stacks reaches 4, increases damage dealt towards enemies to 140%. If the target is on friendly Ice type tiles, increases damage dealt to 160%

5.Effect: Dispels 1 buff from 4 random enemies within range. Increases the number of stacks of Blizzard's Prayer applies by 1. While Dushevnaya has Blizzard's Domain, attacks ignore 30% of the target's DEF, and increases the number of Action Support used by 1 time

6.Effect: Increases damage dealt for all allies by 20%, and additionally increases Ice damage dealt by 40% instead. Dispels 1 Defense type buff after using an active attack. If Dushevnaya is on friendly Ice type tiles, inflicts Vulnerability II on the target for 2 turns

2.Effect: For each excess stack of Blessing of Ice, increases CRIT rate of Hero's Principles by 5%, up to 30%

3.Effect: If an active attack only hit 1 target, increases Ice damage dealt by 20% and damage dealt to Stability Gauge by 2 points

4.Effect: When an active skill creates Ice type tiles, if the area already has Ice type tiles, triggers Tile Reaction and removes the effect of the tile and dispels 1 buff from the enemy. For each tile removed, Dushevnaya gains 1 stack of Blessing of Ice, up to 3 stacks

5.Effect: Winter God's Approval: If this skill causes the enemy to enter into Stability Break, inflicts DEF Decrease II for 2 turns

6.Effect: If Dushevnaya has Blizzard's Domain, she is immune to movement displacement effects

7.Effect: At the start of the action, if Dushevnaya is on friendly Ice tiles, dispels 2 debuffs from self

8.Effect: ATK +5.0% / Increases elemental damage dealt by 10% towards enemies who are unable to move, or whose movement speed is smaller or equal to self
